net.edudb.operator

Class RelationOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edudb.operator.RelationOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EBNode, EBUnaryNode, Operator, QueryNode, UnaryQueryNode

    public class RelationOperator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator, UnaryQueryNode
    Operator that relates to a relation. It has no children because it is the leaf node in the query tree.
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie
